featured.text: With very rapid movements, they used the hoops to construct the symbolic forms around their bodies.
They construct their colonies on precious farmland, invading crops while searching for insects underground.

definition.zh_def: 建造或組織某物，通常是指建築物或其他結構的建立。
definition.en_def: To build or form by putting together parts; to create something.
definition.example: The workers will construct a new bridge over the river.
